summary: A thriller about a standoff between a young man, his fiancée and his best friend who comes to his aide.
cast: Mike Vogel|Danny Pino|Brittany Murphy|Brad Greenquist|Arie Verveen|Natalie Smyka|Guillermo Díaz|Dov Davidoff|William Stanford Davis|Erika Ringor|Mark Engelhardt|Chase Kim|Erika Seifred|Cameron Cash|Jess Domain
title: Across the Hall
